name: effetely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
literary in a way that is weak and lacks power or effectiveness: We continued, somewhat effetely, to express our opinions. The satire of the original film is effetely copied in this remake.
in a way that is, or was traditionally, considered typical of a woman and not suitable for a man: He dabbed effetely at the corners of his mouth with a napkin. He held the teacup effetely with his thumb and forefinger. Related word
effete
More examplesFewer examplesHe effetely insisted that they should just leave if they were not happy with his demands.He plays the effetely decadent lead character.Their raincoats were hanging effetely from their shoulders.
